The release for the NetBeans Grant submission is [http://cashforward.googlecode.com/files/cashforward.zip available for Windows]. It is exported directly from NetBeans - look in the cashforward/bin for the executable.

The release for the NetBeans Grant submission is [http://cashforward.googlecode.com/files/CashForward.mpkg.zip also available for Mac OS X]. 

Note: this is an undocumented release. Over the next two days the documentation will fill on. Watch the [Documentation] space for details.
